title: Flask of Poison
summaries: The Flask of Poison is a flask that will cause any melee weapons or whips to inflict the Poisoned debuff. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, this effect will not be lost when the player dies.

The Flask of Poison cannot be used in conjunction with other flasks, and using it will remove any existing flask effects. This item currently does not apply the debuff in <linked>PvP</linked> scenarios. The debuff lasts for 5–10 seconds

statistics.Tooltip: Melee and Whip attacks poison enemies
